actions.name: Wisened
actions.description: Effect: [Major Affliction]s and [Minor Affliction]s cannot be applied to the user. The user's Stats Stages cannot be decreased by other creatures, but it may still decrease its own.

system.description: Effect: Major and Minor Status Afflictions cannot be applied to the user. The user's Stats Stages cannot be decreased by other creatures, but it may still decrease its own.
